name: In the Matter of D.M.E. and T.J.A. JR., Minors. Petition of T.J.A., Sr., Natural Father

parties: In the Matter of D.M.E. and T.J.A. JR., Minors. Petition of T.J.A., Sr., Natural Father.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of April, 2006, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED and the Motion to Expedite Decision is DISMISSED as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
897 A.2d 1166
In the Matter of D.M.E. and T.J.A. JR., Minors. Petition of T.J.A., Sr., Natural Father.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 27, 2006.
